content: in parts face granny rectangles wrong sides together and find the 2nd chain of the corner ch3s from both rectangles with yarn needle start in the 2nd chain of the corner ch3 working only in the back loops pull almost all the yarn through joining the pieces together leave only a short piece remaining which you will weave in later continue working in each stitch of both pieces but only in the back loops alternate between sides so that if you first go from left to right then go from right to left then again left to right and so on after each stitch gently pull your yarn tighter in the seam keep working like this until you reach the 2nd chain of the corner ch3s on the other side cut any remaining yarn in the pictures i m using yellow yarn so that you can see better what i m doing in reality i made the seam with brown yarn © havuna magic 2025 this pattern is for personal use only single_crochet-border join color a in any stitch chain 1 single_crochet in the same stitch single_crochet around in each double_crochet and back loop of chs * in the 2nd chain of corner ch3s single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet join with a slip_stitch in the 1st single_crochet cut yarn and fasten_off * if you find this method too wavy you can also skip chs weave in ends if your work folds easily from the seam steam ironing helps © havuna magic 2025 this pattern is for personal use only tassels optional to add tassels to your work cut strands of yarn twice as long as you want your tassels to be i wanted my tassels to have 8 strands so i cut 4 for each put your crochet hook in the stitch you want to put your tassel take your strands and fold them in half pull the strands with your hook so that you create a loop on the other side using your fingers pull the strands through the loop and tighten make as many tassels as you want trim them to be about same length thank you <3 contact me havunamagic@gmail com instagram havunamagic © havuna magic 2025 this pattern is for personal use only
